show_name: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta...
other_title: I Reincarnated into an Otome Game as a Villainess With Only Destruction Flags…
My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!
乙女ゲームの破滅フラグしかない悪役令嬢に転生してしまった…
opening_theme: "Otome no Route wa Hitotsu janai! (乙女のルートはひとつじゃない！)" by angela (eps 1-11)
